info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:56PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elbert County through 845 PM MDT... At 756 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ramah, or 25 miles west of Limon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Hail may accumulate on roadways causing hazardous travel. Locations impacted include... Simla and Matheson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
